title: Bloo Power Active Toilet Rim Block Fresh Flowers, with Anti-Limescale, Cleaning Foam, Dirt Protection and Extra Freshness - Pack of 3 Rimblocks
features: Bloo - A hygienically clean and fresh toilet with a boost of fragrance with every flush!
Clean - A strong foaming action to prevent dirt and 100% anti-limescale to keep the loo hygienically clean in between deep cleans
Fragrance - Every ball is loaded with a perfumed core that has 40% more fragrance freshness Vs the outer shell
Long lasting - Each rim block lasts up to 240 flushes and contain a premium fragrance blend for an everlasting enjoyable toilet moment
Design - Bloo’s pioneering ball design and patented* technology ensure that the toilet bowl is sparkling clean after every flush
A boost of floral freshness after every flush
Strong foaming action preventing dirt and grime
description: Product Description Bloo Power Active Toilet Rim Block and Freshener – Flower Scent with 24/7 freshness and dirt protection. Looking for an easier way to keep the toilet clean and fresh? Bloo Power Active toilet rim blocks are easy and convenient, ensuring cleanliness and freshness in your toilet. Bloo Power Active consists of a 4 Function Formula (with patented technology): 1. Cleaning Foam: cleans the toilet with every flush. 2. Anti-Limescale: formula helps prevent limescale formation. 3. Dirt Protection: helps prevent new dirt from sticking. 4. Extra Freshness: leaves a long-lasting fresh scent in the bathroom. Bloo Power Active does not only clean your toilet with every flush, but also provides 24/7 freshness and dirt protection lasting even between flushes, for a cleaner and shinier toilet. Simply hang the toilet rim block on the rim of the toilet bowl where the waterflow is best. When the toilet is flushed, experience cleanliness and freshness. The baskets are recycable. This pack contains 3 x rimblocks, each toilet block lasts up to 240 flushes. Ingredients > 30% Anionic Surfactants, 5 - 15% Non-Ionic Surfactants, Futher Ingredients: Perfumes, Linalool, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone
